summary: This is a forwarded email from December 3, 2009, scheduling a meeting on December 17, 2009, at the USAO in Miami to discuss 'Operation Stolen Globe' and how to handle a potential new investigation against Jeffrey Epstein or others. The email requests FBI presence at the meeting.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the potential target of a new investigation being discussed in the meeting.

events.title: Operation Stolen Globe Meeting
events.description: A meeting scheduled at the USAO in Miami to discuss 'Operation Stolen Globe' and how to handle a potential new investigation against Jeffrey Epstein or others.

keyFacts: A meeting was scheduled for December 17, 2009, to discuss 'Operation Stolen Globe' and a potential new investigation targeting Jeffrey Epstein.
The email explicitly requests FBI presence at the meeting, indicating a multi-agency coordination effort.
The sender mentions being in South Carolina and Colombia before returning to West Palm Beach, suggesting the involved parties were geographically mobile.
The document shows proactive planning by law enforcement regarding a potential investigation into Epstein as of late 2009.
